Author: hondaceviche
Text: Ehh I think we're forgetting about the loads of people who are mentally healthy, but also nutrition-conscious and/or trying to make some kind of change.  Like, it's cool to be able to have some halo top when your pal gets Ben and Jerry's even when you're on a moderate diet. Aaand in recovery I made tons of low-glycemic protein pancakes because I wanted pancakes but eating straight up b r e a d does not make my tummy feel good.  But also, yeah, having an ED makes me veeeery thankful to live in an era where everyone's trying to make food as low-cal as possible. Bless.
